project_abstract.cdata: The project is designed to rehabilitate and develop telephone and telex services. It will provide: (a) telephone exchange equipment, subscriber distribution plant, inter-office cables, sites and buildings for the connection of about 300,000 additional subscriber lines; (b) cables linking local networks with the new trunk dialing exchanges; (c) telex/gentex switching equipment in Tehran and ten provincial centers to allow for the connection of an additional 2,000 telex subscribers, and 290 gentex services; and (d) management consultants and engineering services.
